Party Cakes

Cutting the cake is the pincicle of every party. Sweet Bakes ensures that everyone will be astonished with the look and taste! Order a cake that perfectly matches the theme, color scheme, and vibe of your party. From classic cakes to the most extravagent designs, Sweet Bakes has you covered!

See our pricing chart below for cakes that include a traditional flavor with buttercream frosting and simple decorations. See our Flavors page for a list of traditional and Signature flavors. For custom decorations, designs, flavors, or fillings, request a quote when ordering.*

Size Servings Traditional Flavor Price
6" 8-12 $40.00
8" 15-25 $65.00
10" 30-40 $95.00
12" 50-60 $127.00

Smash Cakes

If you are celebrating a 1st birthday, you can't forget the smash cake! Sweet Bakes wants to celebrate with you by offering a complimentary smash cake. Just mention smash cake when ordering any size regular cake.

Request a Quote

Wedding and Tiered Cakes

From traditional ceremonies to the most off the wall unions, Sweet Bakes will provide the wedding cake of your dreams. Let us be the easiest, stress free decision for your big day. Prices for cakes iced and decorated with buttercream frosting start at $5.50 per serving. Prices for cakes iced and decorated with fondant start at $7 per serving.

Request a Quote

Cupcakes

Cupcakes make party desserts simple and utensil free! Grab and go with any traditional or signature flavor. Cupcake fillings, custom flavors, and designs available.* Request a quote when ordering.

$40.00 per dozen

Mini Cupcakes

What is more fun than cupcakes? Mini-cupcakes! Perfect for small hands. Custom flavors, and designs available.* Request a quote when ordering.

$40.00 per two dozen

Cake Pops

Cake pops offer the ulimtate grab and go dessert option. No plate, no mess! They come in traditional or customs flavors and can even be custom decorated.* Have them individualy wrapped as a party favor for $5 per dozen extra.

$40.00 per dozen

Cake Pucks

Try our new cake pucks! A thick chocolate shell with moist cake inside. You choose from classic or signature flavors!* Surprise your guests with a cake filling for $5 extra per dozen.

$40.00 per dozen

Delivery

There is a $10.00 minimum charge for all products delivered. See map below for approximate delivery fees. Pricing subject to change depending on traffic times and current gas prices.

*Prices may vary. Prices listed include basic buttercream frosting and filling. There may be extra charges for variations or ingredients. All pricing is subject to degree of difficulty and supplies needed. Please contact us for more specific information.
